dynamic_line: Things have been getting weird for the last couple of years.  Then we started hearing rumors of strange lights in the sky at night.
One night I heard my neighbor calling for me to come help him.  I went outside wondering what he could possibly need my help with in the middle of the night.

Some kind of hideous alien was standing over my neighbors disemboweled corpse.  It looked at me and said 'You're a great neighbor' then everything faded to black.  I feel like everything in my body fits differently now.
